title: Daraz.pk Product Scraper
description: Scrape products from Daraz.pk e-commerce platform. Supports categories, search queries, and advanced filtering with intelligent JSON API + HTML parsing.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (Multiple)
startUrls.description: Array of Noon.com URLs to scrape. Each entry should be a URL object with a 'url' property.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Product search keywords (e.g., 'iphone 15', 'dress', 'laptop'). Leave empty to scrape from category URL.

maxProducts.title: Maximum Products
maxProducts.description: Maximum number of products to scrape. Set to 0 for unlimited.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to scrape. Prevents excessive scraping.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price (PKR)
minPrice.description: Filter products by minimum price in Pakistani Rupees.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (PKR)
maxPrice.description: Filter products by maximum price in Pakistani Rupees.

includeOutOfStock.title: Include Out of Stock
includeOutOfStock.description: Include products that are currently out of stock.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for bypassing rate limits. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
